newsitem.title: USA: Green Oasis, M&K Chemical enter agreement.
newsitem.headline: Green Oasis, M&K Chemical enter agreement.

text.p: Green Oasis Environmental Inc said on Tuesday that it entered into a strategic business relationship with M & K Chemical Engineering Consultants Inc.

M & K Chemical Engineering agreed to provide the Green Oasis Environmental with its technical needs, ranging from project engineering and process modeling and simulation to environmental engineering. -- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.
